lines.text:
[Watching ducks flying south]
Suckers! Going south the hard way, huh? Well, you won't catch this little black duck flapping his way to Miami. No, I'm thumbing it this season.

[Stops in front of Daffy]
Say, say, say, boy. You know something, boy? I never pick up hitchhikers! Nope, I never do! Never do! Goodbye!
[Drives off]
Mighty nice of you to give me a rid south. Going to Miami, I see? Well, what could be southier?
Well, b-b-but I...
Oh, just a second while I get my bags.
But there really isn't any room in the back. I...

[Carrying about a dozen suitcases]
I always crave light. No use taking a lot of stuff you'll never use, I always say.
[Opens trunk and tosses bags in]

[singing]
This is the way we pack our bags, pack our bags, pack our bags / This is the way we pack our bags to take them to Miami.
[Struggles to close trunk]
G-Gosh, did you get them all in that l-little compartment?
Certainly. Take a look for yourself, buster.
[Porky opens trunk; all the bags come flying out, knocking him back]
Now that was a bright thing to do. Now we gotta stow'em all over again.
Kinda stepping on it, weren't ya?
Well, you see... He, I...
Relax, I'll handle this. Oh, officer. This man's been acting very suspiciously. If I were you, I'd have a look in the back of the car.
Well, uh...

[to Porky]
In the back... Boi-i-ing!
Oh, n-n-no! Oh, n-no no, please don't look in the b-back compartment, M-mister officer.
Is that so, now? Well, that's just what I'm going to do, mister.
[Daffy snickers as the cop opens the trunk and all the suitcases come flying out and knocking him back]
Who-ho-hoa, Nelly! Well, let's go. I told you I'd keep you out of trouble, didn't I, buster.
[Cop grabs both by the shoulder]

[as Porky comes out of the police station]
Well, how'd you make out, chum?
He l-let me off easy. He only fined me t-t-two dollars.
Two dollars? Why that's an outrage! You wait right here. I'll fix it. I'll slap him with a habeas corpuscle.
[Goes inside, arguing heard]
Oh, he-he, looks like you'll have to cough up another fifty bucks. They slapped us with a reckless driving charge.
I t-t-tried to tell you. Oh, d-drat that crazy duck anyhow!

[Get's kicked out]
I hope you appreciate what I've done for you.
Oooh... Oh, I do, I do. I really do. W-w-wait right here a minute.
[laughs evilly]
Now what's he doing in that gifty shoppe?
[Porky arrives with a present]
Well, what have we got here?
Oh, it's j-j-just a little present for you in a-appreciation for all you've done for me.
A present for me? Oh, boy, give me my present! Give me my present, let me see what my present is! Come on, give me my present!
Oh, n-n-no. It's a surprise for you. I'll j-just put it in here.
[Quickly puts present in trunk]
And d-don't you dare peek.
Ooh, I hate not knowing what it is. I think I'll have a little peek.
[opens trunk, all the luggage comes flying out; Porky drives off laughing]
Ooh, the dirty double crosser!
[sees present]
My present. Oh, boy, I wonder what it is? I gotta see! Gotta see! Gotta see!
[Opens present; inside is an Acme Hitch-hiker Thumb, approved by AAA; cut to Daffy hitchhiking with fake thumb in the snow]
Oh, my aching thumb!
